questions.question: What is the overall shape of the container holding the supplement?
What color is the primary body of the supplement container?
What material appears to compose the supplement bottle?
What color is the cap or lid on top of the container?
What is the apparent texture of the supplement bottle?
What is the dominant color of the label on the back of the container?
What type of seal is visible on the container's label?
What is the overall design style of the product label?
Is there any visible text indicating the product's name or function?
Are there any noticeable symbols or icons present on the label besides text?
What is the primary color of any illustrated elements on the label?
Does the label suggest any specific dietary or health claims?
Is there a barcode present on the product packaging?
What is the apparent size of the text on the label relative to the bottle?
Does the product packaging indicate any certifications or standards?
